charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1101_0100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] finished some
Dynamax training with Marnie.
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_0401_0400_1: Yeah! There was a lot to learn today!
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_0700_1: Heh heh. Looks like Grimmsnarl also had fun!
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_0800_1:
Havin’ Grimmsnarl beside me really gives
me that extra push to try harder, y’know?
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_0900_1: I’ve had him ever since Galar.
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_1000_1:
He battled for me as my trump card in the
Gym Challenge!
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_1100_1:
And now that we’re seein’ the fruits of
our Gigantamax training, he’s even more
dependable.
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_1200_1:
I might’ve told you this, but we couldn’t
Dynamax back in Spikemuth, my hometown.
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_1300_1:
So me and my big bro are used to battlin’
without it.
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_1400_1:
But here on Pasio, there are tons of Trainers
from various regions who battle in ways I’ve
never seen before.
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_1500_1:
That’s why I wanna learn to Dynamax—so I
don’t lose to anyone here!
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_1600_1:
You can’t get very far on Pasio unless
you can battle with different styles!
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_1700_1:
From here on out, Grimmsnarl and I are
gonna keep tryin’ our best!
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_0301_1800_1: I’ll be cheering for you, Marnie!
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_0401_1900_1:
With you backin’ me, I can handle anything,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_0302_2000_1: Mind if I cheer you on, Marnie?
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_0402_2100_1:
Not at all! I look forward to your cheers
backin’ me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_2200_1:
It’s kinda embarrassing, though, since I’m
usually the one doin’ the cheering.
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_2300_1:
But in order to win, we need to train even
more and keep gettin’ stronger.
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_2400_1:
People will be watchin’, and we’ve gotta
give ’em battles worth remembering.
So let’s cheer each other on!
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_2500_1: Heh heh! I’m feelin’ a rush all of a sudden!
charaepi_ch0245_80_mary/2301_1201_2600_1:
All right! Let’s keep it up and give it
one more go!
